title: The default value set in list box of report parameter is lost after modifying the default value
description: The default value set in the list box of a report parameter is being lost after modifying the default value.
OB: When modifying the default value of a report parameter in a list box, the previously set default value is lost.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Create a new report parameter. 2. Set the Display type to List Box. 3. Input three values - 'aa', 'bb', and 'cc'. Set 'aa' as the default value and click OK. 4. Reopen the Edit Parameter dialog. 5. Modify 'aa' to 'aaa' and click OK directly. 6. Reopen the Edit Parameter dialog.
